methods.name: Connection getConnection() throws SQLException
methods.comment:
*

Attempts to establish a connection with the data source that * this DataSource object represents. * * @return a connection to the data source * @exception SQLException if a database access error occurs

methods.name: Connection getConnection(String username, String password) throws SQLException
methods.comment:
*

Attempts to establish a connection with the data source that * this DataSource object represents. * * @param username the database user on whose behalf the connection is * being made * @param password the user's password * @return a connection to the data source * @exception SQLException if a database access error occurs * @since 1.4

methodNames: Connection getConnection(String username, String password) throws SQLException
